text: Joe Leeming (born 1936), is a male former boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== He represented England in the -81 kg division at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He trained at Rugby Corinthians Boxing Club and was the 1958 ABA champion. He made his professional debut on 7 July 1962 and fought in 11 fights until 1963. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:English male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people Category:Light-heavyweight boxers
title: Joe Leeming (boxer)
